titleStmt.title: An admirable method to loue, serue and honour the B. Virgin Mary With diuers practicable exercises thereof. Al inriched with choice examples. Written in Italian by the R. F. Alexis de Salo, Capuchin. And Englished by R.F.
titleStmt.author: Salo, Alessio Segala de.
R. F., fl. 1639.

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition without the printer's name in the imprint.
Running title reads: A method to loue and serue the B.V. Mary.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
